Plot: A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after ruining her sister's wedding and crashing a stolen limousine.
Title: 28 Days
Actors: Sandra Bullock, Viggo Mortensen, Dominic West, Elizabeth Perkins
tomatoConsensus: Even though 28 Days is tackling a difficult subject, it comes off light and superficial, and maybe even a little preachy.
